General.Name: Sepatu Bata Tbk
General.Description: PT Sepatu Bata Tbk. engages in the manufacture and sale of footwear products in Indonesia. The company offers leather footwear, canvas built-up footwear, casual and sports shoes, injection molded sandals/slippers, and industrial safety footwear. It is also involved in the import, export, and distribution of footwear. The company offers its products through stores, as well as online. It serves retail dealers and wholesalers. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sepatu Bata Tbk. is a subsidiary of Bafin (Nederland) B.V.
General.Address: Jl. RA. Kartini Kav. 28, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12430
